Zerra & Co Night Cream

Brand: Zerra & Co

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Argania Spinsosa (Argan) Oil, Propanediol, Urea, Glyceryl Stearate, Gluconolactone, Allantoin, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Sodium Benzoate, Dunaliella Salina (Algae) Extract, Helianthus Annu

act, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
